titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 2409 entitled "A bill for the relief of D.W. Jacobson, Ronal Karkala, and Paul Bjorgen of Grand Rapids, Minnesota" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Star Print ordered on the resolution.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 8/19/1994--Introduced. Refers S. 2409, a bill for the relief of three named individuals, to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
